rukus.text: Ōwa reru yoru ni oite
kagayaku hiru ni oite
danjo o sōzō sa reta okata ni oite (chikau)
Anata gata no doryoku wa, hontōni tayō (na ketsumatsu)dearu
Sore de hodokoshi o nashi,-nushi o osoreru mono
mata shizen o jisshō suru mono ni wa
ware wa (shifuku e no michi o) yōi ni shiyou
Daga gōyokude, unuborete iru mono
shizen o kyohi suru mono ni wa
ware wa (kunan e no michi o) yōi ni surudearou
Kare ga horobi sarou to suru toki, sono tomi wa kare ni yakudatanaidearou
Hontōni michibiki wa ware ni ari
raise mo gense mo ware ni zokusuru
Sorede ware wa moesakaru gōka ni tsuite anata gata ni keikoku shita
Mottomo fukōna monodenai kagiri, dare mo sore de yaka renai
Soreha (shinri o) usodearu to ii somuki satta-sha
Daga (omo no tame ni) chūsei no kagiri o tsukushita mono wa, sorekara sukuwa re
sono tomi o hodokoshi, jibun o kiyomeru
Mata dareka-ra mo, jihi no hōshū o motomenai
Isshōkenmei ni shikōsha,-nushi no mikao o kou dakedearu
Yagate, kare wa (jūbun ni) manzoku dekirudearou
